trans-unit.source: Defines methods for writing <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> parts to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref> to the current page.
AddColorContext adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
The new color context resource that was added.
<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> has been called.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> to the current page.
AddFont adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
The new font resource that was added.
<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> has been called.
Adds a new obfuscated <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> to the current page.
AddFont adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> with optional obfuscation to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
Set the `obfuscate` parameter to `true` when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font.
While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses.

For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to obfuscate the font; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The new font resource that was added.
<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> has been called.
Adds a new obfuscated or restricted <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> to the current page.

AddFont adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> with optional obfuscation or restrictions to the document package, and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
Set the `obfuscate` parameter to `true` when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font.
While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses.

For more information about font obfuscation and the use of restricted fonts see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to obfuscate the font; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to prevent modification of any text that uses the font; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The new font resource that was added.
<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> has been called.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type to the current page.
AddImage adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> with a specified `mimeType` to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the image to add.
The new image resource that was added to the page
<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> has been called.
mimeType is .
mimeType is an empty string.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref> with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType"></xref> to the current page.

<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
For example, `imageType` can be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType>.
to add a JPEG or PNG <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage>, respectively.
The type of image to add to the page.
The new image resource that was added to the page
<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> has been called.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource"></xref> to the current page.
AddResource adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> to the document package, and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
If `resourceUri` is `null`, a unique resource <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Uri%2A> is automatically created.
The type of resource to add.
The absolute path of the resource to add, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
The new [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] resource that was added.
resourceType is .
<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> has been called.
resourceType is an empty string.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> to the page.
AddResourceDictionary adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> that was added to the page.
<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> has been called.
Adds a thumbnail image of a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType"></xref> to the current page.
AddThumbnail adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
For example, `imageType` can be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType>.
to add a JPEG or PNG thumbnail image, respectively.
The image type of the thumbnail image to add to the page.
The new thumbnail image resource that was added.
AddThumbnail has already been called to add an image thumbnail for this page.
<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> has been called.
Flushes and closes the fixed-page writer.

Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the Commit method may be delayed until the complete <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
Gets a list of strings that identify the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"></xref> hyperlink points that are contained in the current page.
A list of strings that identify the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"></xref> hyperlink points that are contained in the page.
Gets the zero-based page number of this page.
The PageNumber property returns the zero-based page number for this <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> of the document.
(PageNumber value of zero is the first page.)
The zero-based page number of this page.
Sets the default printing options for the page.
To be added.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the fixed page.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the fixed page.
Gets an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for writing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] markup to the page.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for writing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] markup to the page.
